snippet.title: NIMRODS - Wishlist Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2086430/NIMRODS_GunCraft_Survivor/

Enlist in NIMRODS, a renowned guild of space hunters who travel across planets to hunt down dangerous extraterrestrial beings for coin! Choose your Nimrod and equip yourself for battle, customizing your starting loadout. With each level up, upgrade and personalize your weapon, which will significantly impact your capabilities and style of play. Create overpowered combinations to annihilate hordes of enemies. Take on the alien bosses, defeating them to unlock their mysterious powers. At the end of each mission, your built weapon will be extracted and returned to base. You can study these battle-hardened relics to uncover new weapons, attachments, armor, and more! 

Join the discord for more news and to play the early demo https://discord.gg/mdbCsgnsS7

Press Kit: https://fiveamp.com/nimrods/press
